topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55931fc763687259580014ff#post_55931fc763687259580014ff
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55931f286368726a080005a9#post_55931f286368726a080005a9
Yeah, but that were _normal persons_, not superhumans with ultimante endurance.[/bq]
Whenever you "flash" organic matter you're physically raising it's temperature so fast that it almost instantly becomes a plasma.  If you were to expose superman/the hulk/saitama into say the 10000k range they would instantly get turned to carbon.
